alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:25PM EDT until July 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sullivan County in central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parksville, or near Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fallsburg, Liberty, Neversink, South Fallsburg, Woodridge, White Sulphur Springs, Parksville, Loch Sheldrake, Woodbourne and Livingston Manor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
